banner.bannerDes: Discover comprehensive resources and expert guidance to promote better health outcomes through informed nutritional choices.

EducationalResources.title: Educational Resources
EducationalResources.des: Explore our curated collection of nutrition education materials designed to help you make informed dietary choices.

categories.title: Healthy Eating Basics
categories.description: Learn fundamental principles of balanced nutrition and dietary guidelines.

categories.title: Nutrition & Mental Health
categories.description: Explore the connection between diet and psychological well-being.

categories.title: Nutrition for Vulnerable Groups
categories.description: Specialized dietary guidance for different population segments.

categories.title: Cultural and Community Nutrition
categories.description: Understanding diverse dietary practices and community health.

categories.title: School Nutrition Programs
categories.description: Resources for implementing healthy eating in educational settings.
